metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19769 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In the Linux kernel 5.3.10, there is a use-after-free (read) in theperf_trace_lock_acquire function (related to include/trace/events/lock.h).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19769` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-extra-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
No subscription required

linux-image-5.3.0-53-generic - 5.3.0-53.47~18.04.1
linux-image-5.3.0-53-generic-lpae - 5.3.0-53.47~18.04.1
linux-image-5.3.0-53-lowlatency - 5.3.0-53.47~18.04.1

linux-image-unsigned-5.3.0-53-lowlatency - 5.3.0-53.47~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1002-oem - 4.15.0-1002.3
No subscription required
